text.emotional: [happiness, low]As it turns out, she never really forgot me or her feelings for me. We will, in fact, make arrangements for a face-to-face meeting at some point in the near future.[/happiness]
text.silence: {.} as it turns out {...} she never really forgot me {.} or her feelings for me {....} we will in fact make arrangements for a face to face meeting at some point in the near future {...}
